transcript: I genuinely believe that you cannot be canceled you can only be canceled in two ways you can be canceled if you choose to stop making content stop being public or all means and methods and channels of communication that you do not control remove you from it if you continue to make content no matter what you did people will find out about you and whether you choose to recant something that you did you know like right or wrong apologize or they like this is complete Bullocks and just be even louder you choose to be canceled and I like that because I like to have as many things under my control as I can
